info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 9:17AM CDT until April 8 at 8:12AM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown affecting Pike and Walthall Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Bogue Chitto River Near Bush affecting St. Tammany Parish.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Bogue Chitto River near Tylertown.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Travel in Hidden Springs Resort is possible but hazardous, as roads will be flooded. Evacuation of the park is recommended, when further rises are expected. Low-lying farm and pasture land near the river will remain flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 130 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING
